5.name: Moira Mactaggert
5.text: One <hero /> with <mutant /> may count one tag twice.

9.name: Fearless
9.text: Blanked if there is more than one <hero /> in your hand.

10.name: Secret ID
10.text: Blanked unless with a <hero /> AND a <location /> with <urban />.

11.name: Worthy
11.text: Blanked unless with a <villain /> with Power greater than 12.

12.name: Berserk
12.text: Choose a <hero /> or <ally />. <score-negative>-3</score-negative> for each OTHER <hero /> or <ally /> and each <urban />.

13.name: Spear of Bashenga
13.text: <score>+7</score> for each other <equipment /> and each other <wakanda />.

15.name: X-Jet
15.text: Add <flight /> to each <hero /> and <ally /> with no <flight />. Add <range /> to one <hero /> or <ally />.

17.name: Mjolnir
17.text: Blanked unless with <name>Worthy</name>, or unless with a <hero /> or <ally /> with <worthy />.

18.name: Cerebro
18.text: If you take <name>Cerebro</name> from the discard area, you may swap a card in your hand with a card in the discard area if either has <mutant />.

27.name: Rogue
27.text: <name>Rogue</name> may copy the base power and one tag of another <hero /> in your hand.

28.name: Shuri
28.text: <name>Shuri</name> and one other <hero /> or <ally /> may each add one of <strength />, <range />, or <agility />.

30.name: Thor Odinson
30.text: Transform with <name>Mjolnir</name> or two or more <ally>Allies</ally>.

32.name: Jean Grey
32.text: Transform with two or more other <mutant />.

33.name: Vision
33.text: <name>Vision</name> has your choice of two different tags, either <strength />, <flight />, <tech />, or <range />.

43.name: High Speed Chase
43.text: <score>+3</score> for each <agility />, for each <flight />, and for each <range />.

52.name: Hidden Lair
52.text: Blank a <villain /> unless with two or more <intel />.

54.name: Xavier Mansion
54.text: Up to three <hero>Heroes</hero> with <mutant /> may each count one tag twice.

60.name: Avoid Crossfire
60.text: <score>+5|7|9</score> for each <range /> if with one|two|three or more cards with <range />.

61.name: Hack In
61.text: <score>+6</score> for each <tech />. Each <tech /> also counts as <intel />.

62.name: Kang
62.text: <score>+5</score> for each different tag in your hand.

66.name: Mystique
66.text: <score-negative>-20</score-negative> unless with two or more <intel /> OR any three cards sharing the same tag.

70.name: Hela
70.text: <score-negative>-20</score-negative> unless with two or more other <asgard />.

73.name: Loki
73.text: At the end of the game, draw a card from the Remix deck and subtract its base power.

74.name: Magneto
74.text: Blank all <equipment /> and ignore all <tech />. (cards with <tech /> keep their other details)

76.name: Selene
76.text: Blank any <hero /> or <ally /> in you hand. Subtract its base power from your total score.

80.name: Squirrel Girl
80.text: Ignore the text box for all <villain>Villains</villain>. All negative <villain /> base powers become positive.
